glsa.title: Portage: Information disclosure
glsa.synopsis: Portage may disclose sensitive information when updating configuration files.

background.p: Portage is the default Gentoo package management system.

description.p: Mike Frysinger reported that the "etc-update" utility uses temporary files with the standard umask, which results in the files being world-readable when merging configuration files in a default setup.

impact.p: A local attacker could access sensitive information when configuration files are being merged.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All Portage users should upgrade to the latest version:
